title: PrismAnalysis
description: Canonical schema for Prism analysis request and response. Extension and backend must align so UI and API stay in sync. Owner: Product/Demo Lead (schema design); Backend Lead and Extension Lead (consumption).

request.description: Payload sent from extension to backend: extracted content and metadata.

response.description: Payload returned by backend to extension: perspectives, optional bias, optional reflection.

bias.description: Bias indicators or scores; shape may vary by experiment.

reflection.description: Optional reflection prompt or question for the user.
